title: Stranger Things
description: A group of kids uncovering secret experiments, supernatural forces, and one strange girl.

title: Inception
description: A skilled thief leads a team into the world of dreams to steal secrets from subconscious minds.

title: Breaking Bad
description: A high school chemistry teacher turned meth producer descends into a dangerous criminal underworld.

title: The Witcher
description: Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter, struggles to find his place in a world where people are often more wicked than beasts.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: Money Heist
description: A criminal mastermind plans the biggest heist in history: to print billions of euros in the Royal Mint of Spain.

title: Dark
description: A time-travel conspiracy affects four families in a small German town.

title: Wednesday
description: Follows Wednesday Addams’ years as a student, where she attempts to master her psychic ability and solve mysteries.

title: Avatar: The Way of Water
description: Jake Sully lives with his newfound family formed on the extrasolar moon Pandora.

title: Loki
description: The mercurial villain Loki resumes his role as the God of Mischief in a new timeline.

title: Black Mirror
description: An anthology series exploring a twisted, high-tech multiverse where humanity's greatest innovations backfire.

title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
description: The hilarious detectives of the 99th precinct solve crimes with humor and heart.

title: The Witcher
description: A mutated monster-hunter struggles to find his place in a world where people often prove more wicked than beasts.

title: The Mandalorian
description: A lone bounty hunter navigates the outer reaches of the galaxy far from the authority of the New Republic.

title: Extraction
description: A black-market mercenary embarks on a deadly mission to rescue the kidnapped son of an imprisoned crime lord.

title: John Wick
description: A legendary assassin comes out of retirement to take revenge on those who wronged him.

title: Peaky Blinders
description: Tommy Shelby leads a gang in post-WWI Birmingham, navigating power, politics, and betrayal.

title: Sherlock
description: Modern-day Sherlock Holmes solves mysteries with his partner Dr. Watson in London.

title: Enola Holmes
description: The teenage sister of Sherlock Holmes uncovers a conspiracy while searching for her missing mother.

title: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
description: Four teens are sucked into a magical video game and must play to survive.

title: Outer Banks
description: A group of teens stumble upon a long-buried secret and hunt for treasure in the Outer Banks of North Carolina.

title: The Office
description: A mockumentary on a group of typical office workers, where the workday consists of ego clashes and awkward moments.

title: Sex Education
description: An awkward teen and his mother, a sex therapist, start an underground sex therapy clinic at school.

title: Cargo
description: A spaceship acts as a post-death transition station for souls, blending mythology with sci-fi.

title: War
description: An Indian soldier goes rogue, and his protégé is sent to track him down.

title: RRR
description: Two revolutionaries fight against British colonialists in a fictional retelling of Indian history.

title: Sacred Games
description: A troubled Mumbai cop uncovers a deeper conspiracy after a gangster leaves cryptic clues.

title: Delhi Crime
description: Based on true events, Delhi Police investigate the horrific 2012 gang rape case.

title: Raat Akeli Hai
description: A small-town cop investigates the murder of a wealthy family's patriarch on his wedding night.

title: Tumbbad
description: Set in 1918, a man seeks hidden treasure in a cursed village rooted in mythology.

title: Skyfire
description: Unusual weather events lead a journalist and scientist to uncover a conspiracy.

title: Drishyam
description: A man covers up a crime to protect his family, leading to a tense cat-and-mouse game with the police.

title: Gone Girl
description: A husband becomes the prime suspect when his wife goes missing, but things aren’t what they seem.

title: Game of Thrones
description: Noble families wage war for control of the Seven Kingdoms of Westeros in this epic fantasy saga.
